Reviews.Title: Jewel of a phone...........
Reviews.Author: James Zelenka
Reviews.Content: This phone is proof you don't need multiple core processors or a 5+ inch screen. I've had numerous phones over the years and they all developed problems, most serious enough to deserve a one way trip to the trash dump.A big point in its favor the jelly bean os is very stable and capable and even the basic single core processor and 768 Mbs of ram have proven to be entirely adequate. There is clearly a reason why Samsung is the biggest phone maker on the planet.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Young S6310l Unlocked GSM Cell Phone Deep Blue Android.
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: So far I love it; still learning but its not difficult; every day I learn something new on this phone. Its a smaller Galaxy for someone that doesn't need a lot of stuff on their desktop, but it has enough memory to keep chats and different applications from the play store. I bought this phone unlocked because I am planing to move abroad and all I have to do is change the Sims to be able to access the country's network. I recommended for traveling

Reviews.Title: Bang for Buck!
Reviews.Author: Robin Payne
Reviews.Content: Great phone for those who are on a tight budget and require the basic features and functionality of a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Nice phoneth
Reviews.Author: Ryan Lester
Reviews.Content: This phone is a really nice phone. It has 1GB RAM with 2GB storage. If you do buy this phone I recommend you get a micro sd card. It makes the space alot bigger. The phone is not good for gaming. The processor is only a single core so it can only do one thing at once. It is a 3G phone. The battery life is really good. The phone lasts a couple days on standby and 1 day with constant use. The sim card is Mini SIM (normal). It will work with any phone carrier that has Mini Sim cards or smaller. My old phone took a micro sim card. If you position the card right it will work. The wifi is great on the phone with no lag at all. If you are one for constant speed with having lots of apps running at the same time this is not the phone for you. If you are looking for a smartphone that has all the support of a regular galaxy but you do not plan to do alot of things at once this phone is for you.

Reviews.Title: Meets my expectations
Reviews.Author: Francisco Ferreira Cardoso
Reviews.Content: Is a great buy for people who doesn't wan't to spend a lot of money in a smartphone, but still want to have all its funcionalities

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Stefan
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my mother the OS is silky smooth... The screen feels excellent colour is amazing image does the phone an injustice... An excellent starter phone for mom... I actually had to order another phone as my brother wanted one also...

Reviews.Title: my new phone
Reviews.Author: Matt Parrinello
Reviews.Content: What can I say it's Samsung! I don't think I've ever heard any bad things about any of their devices or phones. Keep it up guys and thanks amazon.

Reviews.Title: enamorada
Reviews.Author: DIANA C MONTILLA
Reviews.Content: in love with my phone, it works perfectly, no complaints, thank you very much, everything I expected .. successes, kiss

Reviews.Title: Excellent delivery
Reviews.Author: Ram
Reviews.Content: I purchased the product on Thursday and received it by Saturday. It was nicely packed and was unlocked as stated. No issues and concerns thus far.

Reviews.Title: Good things come in small packages!
Reviews.Author: Randy Meacham
Reviews.Content: My wife picked the young out because she didn't want to carry a big phone! But still wanted everything the galaxy3 has to offer.....An she couldn't be more happy with her choice! Everything we expected an more! Finding protective cases not so good so far still looking!

Reviews.Title: I just wanted a phone
Reviews.Author: L. M. Berg
Reviews.Content: I don't text, I have a very good camera for pictures and I don't have a data plan.  My local phone company wanted almost $500. to buy a phone without renewing contract.  But even renewing contact they wanted $300.  I live in an isolated rural area and services are very limited. I did my research and bought this phone.  It immediately connected to our wireless service with the help of the wilson  signal booster ( which we need regardless of phone or company) It had excellent sound and fits comfortably in my pocket. It's a low end starter phone as it's advertised. But it does the job of being a phone just fine. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone
Reviews.Author: Marcy Leon
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my mom, and it works perfectly!!! It works with android which is so easy to handle!

Reviews.Title: meet expectations
Reviews.Author: Audley Walters
Reviews.Content: Its very user friendly. Battery last longer than originally thought it would. Simple to set up and use. I enjoy using it.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: maritza cortes
Reviews.Content: my old phone broke and I needed a new phone. I saw all the great review this phone had and decide to buy it and I am very happy with it, great phone for every day use. delivery was quick.

Reviews.Title: Very good phone!!
Reviews.Author: Gianina Orihuela
Reviews.Content: Excellent! I am very pleased with this phone. I recommend it to anyone. Samsung is top of the line. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Maria Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: i got the product described on the web page and it met the description and characteristic of being an unlocked cell phone

Reviews.Title: all good
Reviews.Author: ANA GODOY
Reviews.Content: all good, the phone was in perfect condition, and I arrived at the right time, brand new, brand new, brand new

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an unlocked phone . I travel between south America, US and Canada. The phone is small enough and solved m need. Just buy a SIM card and it works. Keys are small but that is to be expected. Recommend t phone and the price is right.

Reviews.Title: I love my phone <3
Reviews.Author: Scarlet
Reviews.Content: I love my Samsung.Even though it deletes my contacts sometimes, it's still a great phone. You can download many antivirusprograms for it, I reccomend Malwarebytes :3 It's not really that blue... more of a greyish\ black colour.;3

Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Augustine Ukulu
Reviews.Content: I can only rate this phone by it's look because i bought it for a relative in a different country. The only set back is the picture is very deceitful based on the size. It looks bigger in picture that it really is. I powered it up and it is in working condition. I will have my relative give me feed back after use.
